hero.title: Full Stack Developer specialized in Angular and Java
hero.bio:
Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience in web development, specialized in Angular and Java. Passionate about critical and innovative systems, with experience in projects that impact hundreds of thousands of users.
I stand out for my strong problem-solving skills, acquired through legacy system migrations and the design of secure and scalable solutions.
My technical background, along with experience in infrastructure, networks, and support, makes me a versatile professional.
My goal is to grow as a Backend Developer, lead impactful projects, and continue solving problems that matter.

sections.title: Key impact and responsibilities:
content: Migration of legacy systems from Genexus to modern technologies (Java/Angular), including the invoicing system and water account registration
Technical leadership in LAN/WAN support and networks: critical repairs, team coordination, and peer training
Development of applications impacting 3,000+ employees and 100,000+ people in the province
Involvement in the full development cycle: from requirements gathering to production deployment
Redesign and migration of the institutional website from WordPress to Angular/Genexus, leading a multidisciplinary team

sections.title: Highlighted projects:
content: Complete backend development for a secure assistance app with JWT, role control, and password hashing using bcrypt
Implementation of advanced security: encryption of sensitive data, input validation, restricted CORS
Protection against vulnerabilities: rate limiting, automatic scanning with Dependabot
Deployment best practices: mandatory HTTPS, firewall, and suspicious traffic monitoring
Design of secure and scalable architectures for REST APIs

items.description: Graduated on time (GPA 8.33/10). Trained in systems analysis, data structures, algorithms, OOP, databases, and solving complex problems.
Training in repair, maintenance, and configuration of hardware, LAN/WAN networks, and technical support.

items.comment: Fluent in reading and writing, needs practice in conversation

items.name: Legacy System Migration
items.description: Participation in the migration of critical systems from Genexus to Java, including invoice generation and water account registration systems. This process required advanced analysis of undocumented systems.

items.name: Jujuy Water Utility Website
items.description: Redesign and development of the corporate website, improving user experience and accessibility. Led a multidisciplinary team and made key decisions in UI/UX, ensuring business goals were met.

items.name: Attendance System with Strong Security
items.description: Development of a student attendance system focused on security, implementing JWT authentication and authorization, secure password storage, role validation, sensitive data encryption, and protection against common attacks.

items.name: Digital Signal Generator
items.description: Web application to visualize different types of digital signal encoding, including NRZ-L, NRZ-I, Manchester, and Differential Manchester. Features include start level selection and chart export.

items.name: URL Shortener API
items.description: API for shortening URLs, providing detailed visit statistics and ensuring security and scalability. Includes authentication and authorization features.

items.name: Imagemin UI
items.description: Desktop app built with Electron that serves as a graphical interface for the Imagemin library, allowing easy image optimization with drag and drop, quality selection, and preview.

items.name: Multilingual Personal Portfolio
items.description: Personal portfolio developed with Angular and TypeScript, implementing scalable architecture with centralized services, lazy loading, internationalization (i18n) for Spanish and English, responsive design with Tailwind CSS, dynamic PDF CV generation, and advanced SEO optimizations. Features reusable components, efficient state management, and frontend development best practices.
